EmailTemplate.description: Email template alerting the Time Sheet Owner their Time Sheet was rejected.
EmailTemplate.name: Time Sheet Rejection Alert
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Time Sheet Has Been Rejected
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!TimeSheet.ServiceResource},
This email is to inform you that your Time Sheet submitted for Approval for the Week Ending {!TimeSheet.EndDate} has been rejected, and requires your attention to make the necessary changes in order for your Manager to approve it.
Thank you,
